content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ wrap yourself up in cozy comfort with our handmade quilt-inspired blanket each square is crafted with a unique combination of colorful yarns some with one yarn color and others artfully divided between two they create a stunning color block pattern that will turn heads when arranged together stitch by stitch we ll combine these squares to create a one-of-a-kind masterpiece perfect for snuggling up with on chilly nights get ready for warmth style and handmade charm each granny square will measure 3 5 inches by 3 5 inches the granny square blanket blanket has a stitch video tutorial https //youtu be/xdlppz1xp50 1 **crochet hook ** recommended hook size h 5 0mm 2 - or size to meet gauge **notations ** removable stitch marker 3 yarn needle to weave in ends 4 scissors 5 blocking pins 6 blocking mat 7 granny square wooden blocker 8 automatic sprayer 9 **yarn ** brava worsted 10 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g colorways mint 700 yds 3 skeins marina 700 yds 3 skeins tranquil 700 yds 3 skeins tidepool 920 yds 4 skeins brava speckle worsted 11 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g colorway salt & papper speckle 1650 yds 7 skeins **yardage ** total approx yardage is 4 670 yds **abbreviations** chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet pm - place marker round- round slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 12 **gauge ** 16 sts x 7 row = 4x4 in double_crochet not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 **blanket measurements/sizes ** one size -
